original_text: For thou shalt be in league with the stones of the field: and the beasts of the field shall be at peace with thee.
korean_text: 들에 있는 돌이 너와 언약을 맺겠고 들짐승이 너와 화목하게 살 것이니라

sentences.original_text: For thou shalt be in league with the stones of the field
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 네가 밭의 돌들과 연대하게 될 것임이니

sentences.original_text: and the beasts of the field shall be at peace with thee
